name: An aqueous mixture of peroxylactic acid (PLA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
lactic acid (LA)
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
optionally sulfuric acid (SA)
optionally dipicolinic acid (DPA)
and optionally phosphoric acid (PA)
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxylactic acid (PLA) (CAS Reg. No. 75033-25-9), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), lactic acid (LA) (CAS Reg. No. 50-21-5), optionally 1-hydroxyethylidine-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), optionally sulfuric acid (SA) (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9), optionally dipicolinic acid (DPA) (CAS Reg. No. 499-83-2), and optionally phosphoric acid (PA) (CAS Reg. No. 7664-38-2).
